class dsutils.transformers.TransformWrapper(func)¶

Bases: dsutils.transformers._base.BaseTransformer

Generic class for wrapping functions that do not have parameters that need to be learned from the data. This class implements fit, transform and fit_transform methods for the function.

fit(X, y=None)¶

Fit method :param X: :type X: pandas.DataFrame

transform(X)¶

Transform method :param X: :type X: pandas.DataFrame
